attributes.action: Free TVChannels from Sky,Virgin  & internet for families at home as schoolclosed
attributes.additional_details:
As it will help people to stay sain, and entertained in this bad time.
There are many people on low income and benefits too.
attributes.background: Tell all pay for TV Channels to provide all stations/channels and free internet providers too for free till this Covid 19 is over.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This would be a decision for the individual companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
